cleaned_text: Power of Sound Meditation They date back more than two thousand years, when Buddhism arrived in Tibet from India. Tibetan singing bowls are powerful instruments. Used as potent musical aids to enter a state of meditation, their rich harmonic vibration has a calming, soothing effect on the listener, centering the mind and easing tension all over the body. They date back more than two thousand years, when Buddhism arrived in Tibet from India, and are now present in temples and sanctuaries all over the world. At [AZULIK Healing](https://azulik.us5.list-manage.com/track/click?u=b109493f45505a28702892a1d&id=7033b8ea49&e=c246d52017), we use Tibetan singing bowls in a Sound Meditation and Aromatherapy Ritual, which combines the healing frequencies of these mystical instruments with essential oils to untie energetic knots and activate energy centers.
